name: integration-ocr-tesseract
description: Tesseract.js OCR integration — text extraction from images with bounding boxes, structured output, language detection, batch processing, and worker pool.
postMessage:
Tesseract OCR installed! No external binary needed — tesseract.js runs in Node.js.
Import: import { extractText, batchExtract } from '@/integrations/ocr-tesseract'
